price: (Nkͻmhyεni), Dane woho firi wͻn ho na ka sε: “Asomdwoeɛ.” Na εnkyε wͻbɛhu (nokorɛ a ɛwɔ mu biara).
arabic: فَٱصۡفَحۡ عَنۡهُمۡ وَقُلۡ سَلَٰمٞۚ فَسَوۡفَ يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fa-iṣ'faḥ ʿanhum waqul salāmun fasawfa yaʿlamūna
